ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New UI
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I successfully managed to get  into EQ last night after what seemed like forever to download the patch. of course I waited till after I played for awhile
ygData.messageBody:
Well I successfully managed to get into EQ last night after what seemed
like forever to download the patch.
of course I waited till after I played for awhile before I DL the jaggedpine
zone.

IMHO The new interface looks rather kewl. one feature I liked when you
checked your skills it actually gives you the numerical values of your skill
level on every skill you have trained in and I mean EVERY skill not just
the ones you are rated master or above at. Still trying to figure out the
new icons for the spells atm. I like it that you can have separate chat
windows for your frequently used chats guild tells etc. helps keep stuff
separate a lot better when you are in a battle or have more than one
conversation going at the same time one thing I miss from the old UI is the
face changing ability. hehe there are times when I would like to change my
face around just for the heck of it but if I really wanna do that I guess I
could always go back to the old UI for that. Just wonder if I would have to
redo all my NewUI settings when I go back..


As for JaggedPine I've not traveled there yet. I was at the Bazaar just
before I logged and there were 238 peeps there when I went ld when my
Antivirus autoscan kicked in at 5am EST this morning LOL. I was so caught
up in playing EQ I completely forgot to disable the task LOL

Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 28 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 6 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn Server

----- Original Message -----
From: "Toni" <silly_girl4ever@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2002 1611
Subject: [EverQuest] New UI


>
> Hey, I was just wondering what everybody's thoughts on the new UI are.
I really like it, except the new spell icons, it will take a while to get
used to those. Everything else is pretty cool. It is really nice being
able to create multiple chat windows so you can get rid of battle spam &
such & you don't miss the important things =D
> Toni
>
>
>
>
> Toni aka Katashaka Naboombu
